page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH A FISHERMAN
page.content:
6.Have you ever had any accidents? Accidents are few and far between. The only accident I can recall was a lady falling over the landing stage. But accidents on the boat no. 7.What are your feelings about taking out groups like us? It is fun. I love your chat. 8.Are you often seasick? No never. I do not like rough sea mind you.
Like many others in the area this fisherman now makes his living from the tourists rather than from fishing. His income comes from taking out groups like ours.
